Summaries: There has been a murder at the nightclub. Suspect initially identified as male caucassian mid 20s, cause of death appears to be blunt force trauma.
There was a stabbing at the coffee shop around closing time (8:45pm). Cause of death is a stab wound to the abdomen. No witnesses can be located at present time.
A hispanic man was badly beaten by two unidentified males wearing masks. Officer on duty chased the two suspects into an alley where they prompty dissapeared. Crime occured at 1:20pm
